org.inf.nepalicalendar

Class NepaliDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.inf.nepalicalendar.NepaliDate

  • public class NepaliDate
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class NepaliDate. Stores a nepali Date object

      • toString

        public final java.lang.String toString(java.lang.String format)
        formated output of the date.
        Parameters:
        format - 
         yyyy   Year(4 char)    2067
 yy     Year(2 char)    67
 MMMM   Month (string)  Shrawan
 MM     Month (number)  4
 dd     Day in month    10
        Returns:
        the formated string if format is null
        See Also:
